How to Plan Your DevOps Journey (Issue 2, December 2014)
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
With the constant pressure for successful delivery and shorter time to market, companies must strengthen their DevOps team in order to improve collaborative ties and utilize automation technologies. Gartner's research note: "Seven Steps to Start Your DevOps Initiative," helps companies to close the chasm between development and operations. The research note also highlights the need to automate as much as possible to help the overall DevOps process' scale to broader production-oriented environments. Tricentis has been successful in providing end-to-end test automation and continuous testing in agile environments.
If you would like to read the full Gartner research note, please access it by downloading the Tricentis Newsletter.
